name: Waves Game Jam Game
description:
This was a Game jam game in which the topic was Waves. I worked on this game with 1 other person.

My friend did 3D modelling and texturing for the boat, houses, bridge, and targets.

I was everything else. I had used some assets from the asset store to aid my development in this game. This was a 48 hour project.

To download and install have a Windows Computer (32 bit or 64, it doesn't matter.) download the file, right click it, click unzip. After that double click the file ending with .exe and click play in the launcher!
